io.spine.server.model

Class MethodFactory<H extends HandlerMethod>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.model.MethodFactory<H>
  • Type Parameters:
    H - the type of the handler method objects to create

    public abstract class MethodFactory<H extends HandlerMethod>
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for factory objects that can filter Method objects that represent handler methods and create corresponding HandlerMethod instances that wrap those methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Modifier Constructor and Description

      • checkAccessModifier

        public abstract void checkAccessModifier(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Checks an access modifier of the method and logs a warning if it is invalid.
        Parameters:
        method - the method to check
        See Also:
        MethodAccessChecker

      • create

        public H create(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Creates a handler method from a raw method.

        Performs various checks before wrapper creation, e.g. method access modifier or whether method throws any prohibited exceptions.

        Parameters:
        method - the method to create wrapper from
        Returns:
        a wrapper object created from the method
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - in case some of the method checks fail

      • doCreate

        protected abstract H doCreate(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Creates a model method object from a raw method.

      • checkThrownExceptions

        protected void checkThrownExceptions(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Ensures method does not throw any prohibited exception types.

        In case it does, the IllegalStateException containing diagnostics info is thrown.

        Parameters:
        method - the method to check
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the method throws any prohibited exception types
        See Also:
        MethodExceptionChecker
